name: CSV collections merger
title: CSV collections merger
description: Merge two csv collections. You have an option to prepend collection name to avoid name conflicts.
author: Konstantin taletskiy (konstantin.taletskiy@labshare.org)

inputs.name: append-a
inputs.description: Append collection name to collection A.

inputs.name: append-b
inputs.description: Append collection name to collection B.

outputs.name: output
outputs.description: Output csv collection for the plugin

ui.title: Append collection name to filenames in A:
Append collection name to filenames in B:
